text:
[Sri Rama becomes unconscious on hearing of Sita's killing. Lakshmana prepares to fight.]

राघवश्चापिविपुलंतंराक्षसवनौकसाम् ।

श्रुत्वासङ्ग्रामनिर्घोषंजाम्बवन्तमुवाच ह ।।6.83.1।।
meaning: राघवश्चापि Raghava too, राक्षसवनौकसाम् Rakshasas and Vanaras, तम् them, विपुलम् विपुलम great, सङ्ग्रामनिर्घोषम् noise of the war, श्रुत्वा hearing, जाम्बवन्तम् to Jambavantha, उवाच ह said
translation: Hearing the great noise of war between Rakshasas and Vanaras, Rama said to Jambavantha.

meaning: सौम्य gentle, सुमहान् very great, भीमः terrific, आयुधस्वनः sound of weapons, यथा like that, श्रूयते was heard, हनुमता Hanuman, सुदुष्करम् very difficult कर्म action, कृतम् done, नूनम् surely
translation: "O gentle Jambavan! The terrifying sound of weapons is heard. Surely Hanuman has done a difficult task."

meaning: ऋक्षपतेःking of Bears, तत् therefore, स्वबलेन by your army, अभिसम्वृतः collected together, गच्छ go, युध्यतः to the battlefield, तस्य his, कपिश्रेष्ठस्य best of monkeys, क्षिप्रम् soon, साहाय्यम् to help
translation: "O King of Bears! Accompanied by your army, go to the battlefield and help the best of monkeys."

meaning: ऋक्षराजःking of Bears, तथेति in that way, उक्त्वा spoken, स्वेन sound, अनीकेन marched, सम्वृतः sourrounded, वानरः Vanaras, हनूमान् Hanuman, यत्र there, पश्चिमद्वारम् westerngate, आगच्छत् went
translation: Rama having spoken thus, King of Bears surrounded by Vanaras went to Hanuman at the western gate.

meaning: अथ and then, ऋक्षपतिः Lord of Bears, कृतसङ्ग्रामैः who fought in war, श्वसद्भिः sighing, वानरैःVanara, अभिसम्वृतम् accompanied by, आयान्तम् coming, हनूमन्तम् Hanuman, ददर्श saw
translation: Then the Lord of Bears saw Hanuman accompanied by Vanaras who fought in war coming sighing.

meaning: हनूमान् च Hanuman also, उद्यतम् ready to fight, नीलमेघनिभम् like dark cloud, भीमम् terrific, तत् that, ऋक्षबलम् army of Bears, पथि Lord, दृष्टवा seeing, सन्निवार्य to return, न्यवर्तत he returned
translation: Hanuman seeing the terrific army of Bears marching like a dark cloud asked them to return and he also returned with them.

meaning: महायशाः of great fame, सःhe, तेन by that, सैन्येनसह accompanied by army, शीघ्रम् quickly, सन्निकर्षम् submitted, आगम्य came, दुःखितः sorrowfully, रामाय to Rama, वाक्यम् these words, अब्रवीत्spoken
translation: Hanuman of great fame accompanied by army quickly came to Rama and submitted as follows.

meaning: रावणात्मजः Ravana's son, इन्द्रजित् Indrajith, समरे in war, युध्यमानानम् while we were fighting the war, प्रेक्षताम् looking, अस्माकम् in front of us, पुरःearlier, रुदतीम् crying, सीताम् Sita, जघान struck
translation: "Ravana's son, Indrajith struck Sita, who was crying in front of us looking at us while we were fighting in war."

meaning: अरिन्दम tamer of enemies, ताम् her, दृष्टवा seeing, अहम् I, उद्भ्रान्तचित्तः bewildered in mind, विषण्णः worried, तत् that, वृत्तम् surrounded, भवतः you, विज्ञापयितुम् to inform you, अहम् I, आगतः have come
translation: "O Tamer of enemies! Seeing her (Sita) bewildered in mind, worried, I have come to inform you accompanied by Vanaras."

meaning: तदा then, तस्य his, तत् वचनम् words, श्रुत्वा hearing, राघवःRaghava, शोकमूर्छितः deluded in sorrow, छिन्नमूलः roots cut, द्रुमःइव like a tree, भूमौ on the ground, निपपात fell
translation: On hearing, Hanuman's words Raghava became deluded in sorrow and fell on the ground like a tree cut at the root.

meaning: भूमौ on the ground, पतितम् fallen, देवसङ्काशम् like god, तंराघवम् Raghava, दृश्य seeing, कपिसत्तमाः best of monkeys, समुत्पत्य lifting him, सर्वतः from all over, अभिपेतुः came jumping
translation: Seeing Raghava who is equal to god fallen on the ground, and the best of monkeys lifting him, the Vanaras from all over came jumping.

meaning: सहसा suddenly, उद्यतम् risen up, प्रदहन्तम् burning, अग्निमिव fire like, अनासाद्यम् reaching there, एनम् that way, पद्मोत्पलसुगन्धिभिः with lotuses and lilies fragrance, सलिलैः water, असिञ्चन् sprinkled
translation: Reaching Rama, who was like a burning fire that has risen up and suddenly fallen, the Vanaras sprinkled water with fragrance of lotuses and lilies on Rama just as sprinkling water on an inextinguishable fire that has flared up suddenly.

meaning: अथ and then, सुदुःखितः very worried, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, अस्वस्थम् not well, तंरामम् him, Rama, बाहुभ्याम् arms, परिष्वज्य holding, हेत्वर्थसंयुतम् meaningful, वाक्यम् words, उवाचspoken
translation: Then, Lakshmana who was very worried held the arms of Rama who was unwell and spoke these meaningful words.

meaning: आर्य noble, शुभे virtuous, वर्त्मनि path, तिष्ठन्तम् sticking to, विजितेन्द्रियम् won the senses, त्वाम् you, धर्मःrighteous, अनर्थेभ्यः not able to protect, त्रातुम् danger, न शक्नोति not possible, निरर्थकःis useless
translation: "O Noble Rama! If You, who have gained over senses and sticking to a virtuous path are not protected, from this calamity by righteousness, then righteousness is useless."

text:
भूतानांस्थावाराणां च जङ्गमानां च दर्शनम् ।

यथास्ति न तथाधर्मस्तेननास्तीतिमेमतिः ।।6.83.15।।
meaning: स्थावराणाम् inanimate, जङ्गमानां च animate, भूतानाम् created beings, दर्शनम् seen (experiencing joy), यथा in the same way, अस्ति at present, तथा like that, न not, तेन by that, धर्मःrighteousness, नास्तीतिit is not, मे I, मतिःthink
translation: " As animate and inanimate beings are seen experiencing joy at present, righteousness is not the cause of joy, I think so."

meaning: स्थावरम् inanimate, यथैव in the same way, व्यक्तम् spoken, जङ्गमं च animate also, तथाशिधम् being so, तथा like that, अयम् this, अर्थः meaning, न युक्तः not proper, त्वद्विधः knowing that, न विपद्यते not there
translation: "Just as inanimate beings which are seen happy and animate are also seen in the same manner, in which case that righteousness alone prospers is not there (for a person like you would not suffer). Knowing this you should not suffer."

meaning: अधर्मः unrighteousness, भूतः beings, भवेद्यदि if it is there, रावणः Ravana, नरकम् hell, व्रजेत् will be, धर्मसम्युक्तः endowed with righteousness, भवान् च you also, एवम् in that way, व्यसनम् agony, नाप्नुयात् not have
translation: "If there is unrighteousness, Ravana should be in hell. You who are endowed with righteousness should not have agony."

meaning: तस्य his, व्यसनाभावात् sorrowful feeling, त्वयि you, व्यसनम् agony, आगते experienced, धर्मेण by righteousness, अधर्मम् unrighteousness, अधर्मेण by unrighteousness, धर्मताम् righteousness, उपलभे will be acquired
translation: " As Ravana has no sorrow and you have experienced agony the contraries of each other have changed the roles of righteousness and unrighteousness."

meaning: धर्मेण by righteousness, धर्मम् righteousness, उपलभेत् attained, अधर्मतः by unrighteous means, अधर्मं च unrighteous means, येषु also, अधर्मःunrighteousness, प्रतिष्ठितः is rooted, अधर्मेण by unrighteousness, युज्येरन् यदि if united with, अधर्मुरुचयःpleased with unrighteousness, जनाःpeople, धर्मेण by duty, न वियुज्येरन् will not, धर्मेण as duty, धर्मम्righteousness, चरताम् moving, एषाम् they, धर्मफलम् result of following righteousness, भवेत् will attain
translation: "The righteous attains the benefit through righteous means, and the unrighteous suffer by unrighteous means. If unrighteousness is rooted in the unrighteous and are pleased with unrighteousness they will be deprived of the result of righteousness. It is not otherwise."

meaning: धर्मेण by righteousness, धर्मम् righteousness, उपलभेत् attained, अधर्मतः by unrighteous means, अधर्मं च unrighteous means, येषु also, अधर्मःunrighteousness, प्रतिष्ठितः is rooted, अधर्मेण by unrighteousness, युज्येरन् यदि if united with, अधर्मुरुचयःpleased with unrighteousness, जनाःpeople, धर्मेण by duty, न वियुज्येरन् will not, धर्मेण as duty, धर्मम्righteousness, चरताम् moving, एषाम् they, धर्मफलम् result of following righteousness, भवेत् will attain
translation: "The righteous attains the benefit through righteous means, and the unrighteous suffer by unrighteous means. If unrighteousness is rooted in the unrighteous and are pleased with unrighteousness they will be deprived of the result of righteousness. It is not otherwise."

meaning: येषु since, अधर्मः in the unrighteous, प्रतिष्ठितः is rooted, यस्मात् therefore, अर्थाःwealth, विवर्थन्ते develop, धर्मशीलाः च who follow dharma, क्लिश्यन्ते च suffer, तस्मात् therefore, एतौ both these, निरर्थकौ are meaningless
translation: "Since those rooted in unrighteous develop and are wealthy, and those who follow dharma suffer both these are meaningless."

meaning: राघव Raghava, पापकर्माणः sinful actions, अधर्मेण through unrighteous means, वध्यन्तेयदि if kills, वधकर्महतः by this action of killing, सःअधर्मः that adharma, हतः of killing, कम् whom, वधिष्यतिwill be destroy
translation: "Righteousness and unrighteousness are forms of actions, sinful or not sinful. If sinful action is unrighteous, those who have done sinful actions should suffer. Since sinful action is momentary, and as soon as the action is over unrighteousness is also gone. That being so how can unrighteousness cause pain to anyone?"

meaning: अथवा or else, विहितेन destroyed, अयम् this, हन्यते by killing, अपरम् another, हन्तिवा or kills another, तेन by that, पापेनकर्मणा sinful action, सःविधिः destiny, लिप्यते is deprived, सः he, the agent, न not
translation: "Or else if a man is destroyed by killing another, destiny which is engendered by the sinful action suffers and not the doer of sinful action."

meaning: अरिविकर्षण crusher of enemies, अदृष्टप्रतिकारेणreward is not seen, त्वव्यक्तेन how to know, असतासता unreal or real, धर्मेण by righteousness, परम् best, प्राप्तुम् attained, कथम् how, शक्यम् is it possible
translation: "O Crusher of enemies! How does righteousness get encountered? It is not seen. How to know whether it is real or unreal? Is it possible to know that the best result is attained by righteousness."

meaning: सताम् best among victorious, मुख्य jewel, सत् good, स्यात् यदि as such, तव your, किञ्चन even little, असत् evil, न स्यात् not accrue, त्वया by you, यत् such, ईदृशम् this difficulty, प्राप्तम् attained, तस्मात् therefore, सत् real, न उपपद्यते should not have happened
translation: "O foremost among the victorious! To you, who are a jewel no evil should accrue. Since such difficulty has been faced by you, the fact that good actions result in good destiny is not true."

meaning: अथवा or else, धर्मःdharma, दुर्बलःfeeble, क्लीबःineffective, बलम् might, अनुवर्तते follows, दुर्बलःfeebleness, हृतमर्यादःnot to follow such dharma, न सेव्यःइति not serve like this, मे I, मतिः think
translation: "Or else dharma becomes feeble, ineffective, submits to might, then it is better not to follow such dharma which is feeble, I think."

meaning: पराक्रमेcourageous, धर्मःdharma, बलस्यseek strength, गुणभूतःयदिचेत् predominance of virtue, धर्मम् dharma, उत्सृज्य giving up, धर्मे dharma, यथा like that, तथा it is, बले might, वर्तस्व seek
translation: "Giving up predominance of virtue, seek courage and submit to might for succeeding in action. Seek might just as you have sought dharma earlier for success."

meaning: परन्तप scorcher of enemies, अथ now, सत्यवचनम् truthful words, धर्मःकिलचेत् if you consider as dharma, अनृतःuntruth, त्वयि you, अकरुणः not compassionate, पिता father, त्वया you, किम् why, न बद्धःdid not bind
translation: "O scorcher of enemies! If you consider speaking the truth is dharma, why did you not bind your father (who promised to give the kingdom) and was not compassionate (spoke untruth later)."

meaning: परन्तप scorcher of enemies!, धर्मोवा if dharma alone, अधर्मोवा or adharma, भूतःpresent, भवेद्यदि and in future, वज्रीIndra, शतक्रतुः a hundred sacrifices, मुनिम् sage, हत्वा killing, इज्याम् sacrifice, न स्मकुर्यात् not performed
translation: "Indra killed an ascetic (Viswarupa) and did fire sacrifice. If dharma alone is his duty, he could have done hundreds of fire sacrifices and not have killed the ascetic. If adharma is duty he would have killed the ascetic and not done fire sacrifice."

meaning: काकुत्स्थKakuthsa, राघव Raghava, अधर्मसंश्रितःfollowing adharma, धर्मःdharma, विनाशयति destruction is happening, नरः humans, एतत् in this manner, सर्वम् all, यथाकामम् as per his desire, कुरुते does
translation: "Kakuthsa Rama! Kings followed dharma and adharma both according to context. Whether following dharma or adharma destruction is happening. Therefore, humans keep doing both as per their desire."

meaning: तात dear, राघव Raghava, अयम् this, धर्मःइति dharma like this, मम च me too, इदम् thus, मतम् opinion, तदा then, राज्यम् kingdom, उत्सृजता giving up, त्वया by you, धर्ममूलम् dharma as root, छिन्नम् wonderful
translation: "Dear Raghava! In my opinion also depending on desire and context, following dharma or adharma is proper. You have severed the roots of dharma by giving up the kingdom."

meaning: ततस्ततः, by all those means, सम्वृत्तेभ्यःaugmented, प्रवृद्धेभ्यः developed, अर्थेभ्यःprosperity, पर्वतेभ्यः mountains, अपगाःइव rivers flow, सर्वा all, क्रियाः actions, प्रवर्तन्तेहि follow
translation: "Prosperity is augmented gradually and developed by all means just as rivers flow from mountains, all undertakings follow conducive to success."

meaning: अर्थेन by wealth, विमुक्तस्य forsaken, अल्पचेतसःmeagre intelligence, पुरुषस्य of men, सर्वाःक्रियाःall actions, ग्रीष्मेsummer, कुसरितोयथा dries up like that, विच्छिद्यन्तेinterrupted
translation: "Just like streams dry up in summer, if one who is of meagre intelligence and forsakes wealth, all his actions will be interrupted."

meaning: सुखैदितः one who has been happy, सः he, अयम् this, अर्थम् wealth, परित्यज्य renouncing, सुखकामः seeking happiness, पापम् sinful, कर्तुम् will perform actions, आरभते starts, तदा then, दोषः mistake, प्रवर्ततेproceeds
translation: "If one who has been happy seeks happiness on renouncing wealth then proceeds to perform sinful actions it is a mistake."

meaning: यस्य his, अर्थाः wealth, तस्य his, मित्राणि friends, यस्य whom, अर्थाः wealth, तस्य whom, बान्धवाः relations, यस्य whose, अर्थाः wealth, सः he, लोके in this world, पुमान् manliness, यस्य his, अर्थाः wealth, सः he, पण्डितः च learned
translation: "Friends gather round him in whom riches abide. Relations stand by him who has wealth. He is considered manly in whom wealth abides, and he is learned who has wealth."

meaning: यस्य whoseअर्थाः wealth, सः च he also, विक्रान्तः gallant, यस्य his, अर्थाः wealth, सः च he is बुद्धिमान् intelligent, यस्य his, अर्थाः wealth, सः he, महाभागः glorious, यस्य his, अर्थाः wealth, ससः superior, महागुणः of great virtues
translation: He is gallant to whom wealth has flown, he is intelligent in whom wealth abides, he is glorious in whom wealth exists and he is superior in great virtues in whom wealth found receptacle.

meaning: वीर heroic, राज्यम् kingdom, उत्सृजता giving up, त्वया by you, येन by that, बुद्धि intellect having done, कृता do, मया by me, अर्थस्य wealth, परित्यागे giving up, एते those, दोषाः evils, प्रव्याहृताःfollow
translation: 'If you give up wealth the evils will follow you', said I. Now you left the kingdom. The basis on which you made such a resolve is not known to me.

meaning: यस्य its, अर्थाः wealth, तस्य his, धर्मकामार्थाःdharma and pleasure,, wealth, सर्वम् all, प्रदक्षिणम् going round, अर्थकामेन desiring wealth, विचिन्वता worrying, अधनेन one who has no wealth, अर्थः wealth, न शक्यः not possible
translation: For one who has wealth all his actions of dharma would give pleasure and favourable. One who has no wealth and is worrying about it can't attain it.

meaning: नराधिप Lord of humas, Rama, हर्षः delight, कामश्च desire, दर्पश्च pride, धर्मः virtue क्रोधः anger, शमः forgiveness, दमः fortitude, एतानि all these सर्वाणि everything, अर्थात् by wealth, प्रवर्तन्ते effective in action
translation: "O Rama! Desire, delight, pride, virtue, anger, forgiveness, fortitude all these are effective through wealth."

meaning: येषाम् these, चरताम् practicing, धर्मचारिणाम् followers of dharma, अयंलोकः in this world, नश्यति will perish, ते they, अर्थाः wealth, दुर्दिनेषु in the renunciates, ग्रहाःयथा like planet, न दृश्यन्ते not found
translation: "Even if there is wealth if one renunciates wealth and follows dharma in this world they perish like planets on cloudy days."

meaning: वीर heroic, गुरोः teacher, वचने words, स्थिते faithful to the promise, त्वयि to you, प्रव्रजिते leaving home, प्राणैः life, प्रियतरा dear, तवभार्या your wife, रक्षसा Rakshasa, अपहृता abducted
translation: "O heroic Rama! You have been faithful to the promise to your father and left home following dharma (giving up wealth), and your dear wife who is your life has been abducted by Rakshasa."

meaning: वीर heroic, इन्द्रजिताIndrajith, कृतम् तत् having done so, विपुलम् very, दुःखम् sorrow, अद्यthis कर्मणा action, व्यपनेष्यामि will get rid of the the agony, राघव Raghava, तस्मात् therefore, उत्तिष्ठ get up
translation: "Get up, heroic Raghava! I will get rid of the agony caused to you by Indrajith, by the action."

meaning: नरशार्दूल tiger among men, दीर्घबाहो broad shouldered, धृतव्रत determined, उत्थिष्ठ getting up, महात्मानम् great soul, कृतात्मानम् doer of action, आत्मानम् yourself, किं न बुध्यसे why not thinking
translation: "O tiger among men! O broad shouldered endowed with fortitude! Why do you not know yourself that you are a great soul and doer of action?"
